Custom Software Development Services for Businesses

Bill Vivino Technology provides custom software development services for startups and enterprise teams. From mobile apps to cloud-native APIs, we deliver secure, scalable solutions that help your business grow.
We’re based in North Jersey, serve the NYC metro area, and work with clients across the United States.

Together, let's turn dreams into reality.

Let's build something.

Why Choose Bill Vivino Technology

Leading a team of experienced software engineers, we specialize in building secure, scalable iOS, Android, Web, and Cloud solutions, helping founders and enterprises bring their ideas to life.
We proudly serve clients locally in North Jersey and NYC, and remotely throughout the United States.

Core Development Services

  • iOS & SwiftUI app development
  • Android & Kotlin app development
  • React Native cross-platform/hybrid apps
  • Backend APIs & Firebase/Node.js
  • AR/VR & Unity-based experiences
  • AI & Machine Learning integrations
